name: Nyx by Virtuals
description: Nyx is the first virtual idol created by Alias Labs with KIRA X (xiaooo404 on Instagram) on the Virtuals Protocol on Solana, powered by decentralized compute and storage from 0G Labs and self-improving AI using the evolveRL framework. This innovative collaboration redefines virtual entertainment by seamlessly blending human artistry with scalable, decentralized intelligence, paving the way for a future where digital idols not only entertain but also actively participate in the creative price.
